a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (9)

p.k:
Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away.
Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery (2020).
